name: The Rookie Highball
description: In this variant of the classic Scotch and Soda highball, Chris swaps out the Scotch for Irish Whiskey, and subs in a good proportion of Gin-based Pimm's. A dash of lemon juice and Angostura bitters add acidity and complexity to the mix, and ginger ale finishes it off.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce Irish whiskey (such as Jameson or Bushmills)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine Pimm's, whiskey, lemon juice, and bitters in a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale and and stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist and serve.
